query:
mutation ($input0:UpdateVdpLaunchConfigurationCurrentStepInput!) {
		updateVdpLaunchConfigurationCurrentStep(input:$input0) {
			clientMutationId,
			vdp_launch_configuration {
				current_configuration_step,
				has_changed_brand_promise,
				has_changed_disclosure_policies,
				has_changed_out_of_scope,
				has_changed_safe_harbor,
				has_changed_scope,
				id,
				launch_at,
				launch_requested_at,
				policy_brand_promise,
				policy_disclosure_policies,
				policy_out_of_scope,
				policy_safe_harbor,
				policy_scope,
			},
			was_successful,
		}
	}
